text: Heaven on Earth is the second studio album by American singer Belinda Carlisle. It was released on October 5, 1987 through MCA Records. It went to number 1 in Norway, number 3 in New Zealand, number 3 in Sweden, number 4 in Switzerland, number 4 in the United Kingdom and number 13 in the United States. ==Track listing== ==Notes== == References == Category:1987 albums
title: Heaven on Earth (Belinda Carlisle album)
